page.title: 05Local News Stories.
page.content: Government financial cuts are affecting school standards.Rural bus services are also cut making travel difficult,however a new policy tackles {unemployment}in the N.E. rural declining communities.Unfortunately unemployment figures rose in April by {128 to 7788}despite expected summertime increase.A Medomsley naturalist,Ralph Pirt reminded us of the dangers to the regions hedgerows and verges,mercilessley being destroyed and its wildlife with it. Street hygiene is a problem with dirty dogs.The increase in young offenders is being tackled by the Home Secretary ,Leon Britton by the"Short,Sharp shock"treatment which he came to observe at Medomsley Detention Centre. However a street drummer heralds brighter future events in a Derwentside Festival week.
